contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quévert |native name = Kever |latitude = 48.4644 |longitude = -2.0858 |INSEE = 22259 |postal code = 22100 |department = Côtes-d'Armor |arrondissement = Dinan |canton = Dinan-Ouest |mayor = Alain Burlot |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Dinan |elevation min m = 49 |elevation max m = 130 |area km2 = 12.48 |population = 3488 |population date = 2008 }} '''Quévert''' ({{Lang-br|Kever}}, [[Gallo language|Gallo]]: ''Qevèr'') is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Côtes-d'Armor]] (Aodoù-an-Arvor) [[Departments of France|department]] of [[Brittany (administrative region)|Brittany]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== Inhabitants of Quévert are called ''quévertois'' in French. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Côtes-d'Armor department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.hcquevert.com/modules/news/ Rink Hockey Club Quévertois] {{Fr icon}} {{Côtes-d'Armor communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quevert}} [[Category:Communes of Côtes-d'Armor]] {{CôtesArmor-geo-stub}}
